Lifelink
{1}{B}, {T}: If you lost life this turn and you discarded a card or sacrificed a permanent this turn, Dark Rite Cleric becomes a 5/5 Demon and gains flying. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i][/i][i][i]
[/i]Whenever Dark Rite Cleric attacks, if it's a Demon, you may pay 5 life. If you do, draw five cards.
